title: T206s For Sale - A nice assortment
author: T206Collector

posts.post_title: T206s For Sale - A nice assortment
posts.post_content:
I'm going to be selling off a bunch of my raw T206s in the coming days.  We'll start it off with a few interesting singles and groupings.

Email me at [url]SignedT206@gmail.com[/url] if you're interested.

Prices are delivered, payment by PayPal f/f.

1.  Cicotte - SOLD
2.  Titus - SOLD
3.  Smith CHI & BOS - MOVED TO B/S/T AUCTION
4.  Milligan VG (Old Mill) - MOVED TO B/S/T AUCTION
5.  Doyle NY (Polar Bear & TRIM) - SOLD

6.  Lot of 4 sharp corners, no creases, but back damage (nice fronts preserved in scrap books obviously) - SOLD

7. Pair of 2 nice T206s, but obviously trimmed - SOLD

I will take Doyle polar bear

Sent from my SM-G920P using Tapatalk
Email sent.  I will take Lake and Bradley.
If you happen to add a Scoops Carey or Woodie Thornton (any back/any condition), please feel free to message me! Collecting those two and don't want to miss out!
